name: South African Coderz
tag_list: training, unemployment, new-jobs, programming, business, entrepreneur
overview:
Company was created to meet one of the pressing demands in this country right now. High unemployment and the large gap between the number of job seekers and small number of positions currently available.

We want to take unemployed people with IT promise and train them into either Desktop, Web, Games or Mobile programmers.

NOT only will they have training they will also be working on live projects which means they can hit the ground running.

BUT more than that. We want to equip them with the the business skills to be able to go out and start their own companies thereby helping to create more work opportunities
